page.title: 18People of Riddings:Jobs-2
page.content: Page 17:Number who enjoy job 34 Page 17:Number who don't 4 ---------- Where people work. Distance from Riddings(miles) No. 0 ----------- 10 1-3 ----------- 6 4-6 ----------- 10 7-9 ----------- 0 10-12 ----------- 0 13-15 ----------- 6 16-18 ----------- 2 Over 18 ----------- 3 Main reasons for liking job: 10 said the job was satisfying or interesting; 4 said they enjoyed the company; 11 liked meeting or caring for people; 5 liked the money. Main reasons for not liking job: The main reason was that the job was boring.
